name: Slime Ascension
description:
Fight foes to join together with slimes and combine your allies into bigger allies. Ascend and merge with the great sun slime to reach ascension.

CONTROLS
WASD/Arrow keys
Mouse
ESC to open pause menu

SLIMES
Red: Close-range, AoE attack with large knockback.
Purple: Long-range, single-target attack with small knockback.
Blue: Casts a shield to protect allied slimes from one hit.

CREDITS
Programming: Scorrpo
Art: Kestro, Cappy
Music: Fluidity by Toby Smith

Made in 48 hours during GMTK Jam 2021. Theme: Joined Together
